p: The other compounds in flaxseed are Lingnan phytoestrogens. Phytoestrogens are herbal steroids that have an oestrogen‐like structure that binds to the ER‐α and ER‐β and produces a response without negative effects of synthetic oestrogens (Harris et al., 2005; Strauss et al., 1998) (Strauss et al., 1998). Studies on phytoestrogens about bone health in postmenopausal women and prostate health in men have shown promising results (Dalais et al., 1998; van de Poll, 2004; Marini et al., 2007).
